response.overview: Ross’ mum and her boyfriend Gregor are having The Manitoba Wedding Social To End All Manitoba Wedding Socials, and everyone is invited. Even if you’re from out of town, and have no idea what a Social is. You will find out.
response.tagline: On every street in every corner of the world, there’s somebody selling tickets to something. In this town, that something is called… A SOCIAL
response.title: A Social
